item.title: Bitcoin hits fresh record, races toward $100,000 as rally continues
item.description: Bitcoin breached the $98,000 level for the first time as investors continued pricing in a second Donald Trump presidency.

item.title: European stocks turn flat amid subdued market sentiment; JD Sports slumps 12% on profit warning
item.description: European stocks turned flat late-morning Thursday, amid weak global market sentiment.

item.title: British regulators will soon announce competition remedies for the multibillion-pound cloud industry

item.title: Ukraine says Russia launched an intercontinental missile in an attack for the first time in the war
item.description: Two people were wounded as a result of the attack, and an industrial facility and a rehabilitation center for people with disabilities were damaged, a...

item.title: Nvidia shares slump 3% in premarket as quarterly revenue growth slows
item.description: Despite nearly doubling sales year-on-year, Nvidia's third-quarter results show a slowdown from previous quarters.
